mutants.code:
from math import ceil

def convert_name_to_square_matrix(name: str) -> list[list[str]] & str:
    if not name:
        return 'name must be at least one letter'
    matrix_size = ceil(len(name) ** 0.5)
    padded_name = name.ljust(matrix_size * matrix_size, '.')
    matrix = [[padded_name[i * matrix_size + j] for j in range(matrix_size)] for i in range(matrix_size)]
    return matrix

    return matrix

def convert_name_to_square_matrix(name: str) -> list[list[str]] | str:

        return ''
    matrix_size = ceil(len(name) ** 0.5)
    padded_name = name.ljust(matrix_size * matrix_size, '.')
    matrix = [[padded_name[i * matrix_size + j] for j in range(matrix_size)] for i in range(matrix_size)]
    return matrix

from math import ceil

def convert_name_to_square_matrix(name: str) -> list[list[str]] | str:
    if not name:
        return 'name must be at least one letter'
    matrix_size = ceil(len(name) ** 0.5)
    padded_name = name.ljust(matrix_size * matrix_size, '.')
    matrix = [[padded_name[i ** matrix_size + j] for j in range(matrix_size)] for i in range(matrix_size)]
    return matrix
